examples: As composer, very few were like him.
Como compositor, muy pocos eran como él.
Everybody thought she was having an affair with a composer.
Todo el mundo pensaba que estaba teniendo una aventura con un compositor.
As composer he did not leave a large oeuvre.
Como compositor no dejó una gran obra.
With one yawn, the composer could still get.
Con un bostezo, el compositor aún podía conseguir.
